title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 69 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 69 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Save me, O God; for the waters are come in unto my soul.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗，交与伶长，调用百合花）神阿，求你救我。因为众水要淹没我。

lineList.en: I sink in deep mire, where there is no standing: I am come into deep waters, where the floods overflow me.
lineList.cn: 我陷在深淤泥中，没有立脚之地。我到了深水中。大水漫过我身。

lineList.en: I am weary of my crying: my throat is dried: mine eyes fail while I wait for my God.
lineList.cn: 我因呼求困乏，喉咙发乾。我因等候神，眼睛失明。

lineList.en: They that hate me without a cause are more than the hairs of mine head: they that would destroy me, being mine enemies wrongfully, are mighty: then I restored that which I took not away.
lineList.cn: 无故恨我的，比我头发还多。无理与我为仇，要把我剪除的甚为强盛。我没有抢夺的，要叫我偿还。

lineList.en: O God, thou knowest my foolishness; and my sins are not hid from thee.
lineList.cn: 神阿，我的愚昧你原知道。我的罪愆不能隐瞒。

lineList.en: Let not them that wait on thee, O Lord GOD of hosts, be ashamed for my sake: let not those that seek thee be confounded for my sake, O God of Israel.
lineList.cn: 万军的主耶和华阿，求你叫那等候你的，不要因我蒙羞。以色列的神阿，求你叫那寻求你的，不要因我受辱。

lineList.en: Because for thy sake I have borne reproach; shame hath covered my face.
lineList.cn: 因我为你的缘故受了辱骂，满面羞愧。

lineList.en: I am become a stranger unto my brethren, and an alien unto my mother's children.
lineList.cn: 我的弟兄看我为外路人。我的同胞看我为外邦人。

lineList.en: For the zeal of thine house hath eaten me up; and the reproaches of them that reproached thee are fallen upon me.
lineList.cn: 因我为你的殿心里焦急，如同火烧。并且辱骂你人的辱骂，都落在我身上。

lineList.en: When I wept, and chastened my soul with fasting, that was to my reproach.
lineList.cn: 我哭泣，以禁食刻苦我心，这倒算为我的羞辱。

lineList.en: I made sackcloth also my garment; and I became a proverb to them.
lineList.cn: 我拿麻布当衣裳。就成了他们的笑谈。

lineList.en: They that sit in the gate speak against me; and I was the song of the drunkards.
lineList.cn: 坐在城门口的谈论我。酒徒也以我为歌曲。

lineList.en: But as for me, my prayer is unto thee, O LORD, in an acceptable time: O God, in the multitude of thy mercy hear me, in the truth of thy salvation.
lineList.cn: 但我在悦纳的时候，向你耶和华祈祷。神阿，求你按你丰盛的慈爱，凭你拯救的诚实，应允我。

lineList.en: Deliver me out of the mire, and let me not sink: let me be delivered from them that hate me, and out of the deep waters.
lineList.cn: 求你搭救我出离淤泥，不叫我陷在其中。求你使我脱离那些恨我的人，使我出离深水。

lineList.en: Let not the waterflood overflow me, neither let the deep swallow me up, and let not the pit shut her mouth upon me.
lineList.cn: 求你不容大水漫过我，不容深渊吞灭我，不容坑坎在我以上合口。

lineList.en: Hear me, O LORD; for thy lovingkindness is good: turn unto me according to the multitude of thy tender mercies.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你应允我，因为你的慈爱本为美好。求你按你丰盛的慈悲，回转眷顾我。

lineList.en: And hide not thy face from thy servant; for I am in trouble: hear me speedily.
lineList.cn: 不要掩面不顾你的仆人。我是在急难之中。求你速速的应允我。

lineList.en: Draw nigh unto my soul, and redeem it: deliver me because of mine enemies.
lineList.cn: 求你亲近我，救赎我。求你因我的仇敌把我赎回。

lineList.en: Thou hast known my reproach, and my shame, and my dishonour: mine adversaries are all before thee.
lineList.cn: 你知道我受的辱骂，欺凌，羞辱。我的敌人都在你面前。

lineList.en: Reproach hath broken my heart; and I am full of heaviness: and I looked for some to take pity, but there was none; and for comforters, but I found none.
lineList.cn: 辱骂伤破了我的心。我又满了忧愁。我指望有人体恤，却没有一个。我指望有人安慰，却找不着一个。

lineList.en: They gave me also gall for my meat; and in my thirst they gave me vinegar to drink.
lineList.cn: 他们拿苦胆给我当食物。我渴了，他们拿醋给我喝。

lineList.en: Let their table become a snare before them: and that which should have been for their welfare, let it become a trap.
lineList.cn: 愿他们的筵席，在他们面前变为网罗，在他们平安的时候，变为机槛。

lineList.en: Let their eyes be darkened, that they see not; and make their loins continually to shake.
lineList.cn: 愿他们的眼睛昏蒙，不得看见。愿你使他们的腰常常战抖。

lineList.en: Pour out thine indignation upon them, and let thy wrathful anger take hold of them.
lineList.cn: 求你将你的恼恨，倒在他们身上，叫你的烈怒追上他们。

lineList.en: Let their habitation be desolate; and let none dwell in their tents.
lineList.cn: 愿他们的住处，变为荒场。愿他们的帐棚，无人居住。

lineList.en: For they persecute him whom thou hast smitten; and they talk to the grief of those whom thou hast wounded.
lineList.cn: 因为你所击打的，他们就逼迫。你所击伤的他们戏说他的愁苦。

lineList.en: Add iniquity unto their iniquity: and let them not come into thy righteousness.
lineList.cn: 愿你在他们的罪上加罪，不容他们在你面前称义。

lineList.en: Let them be blotted out of the book of the living, and not be written with the righteous.
lineList.cn: 愿他们从生命册上被涂抹，不得记录在义人之中。

lineList.en: But I am poor and sorrowful: let thy salvation, O God, set me up on high.
lineList.cn: 但我是困苦忧伤的。神阿，你的救恩，将我安置在高处。

lineList.en: I will praise the name of God with a song, and will magnify him with thanksgiving.
lineList.cn: 我要以诗歌赞美神的名，以感谢称他为大。

lineList.en: This also shall please the LORD better than an ox or bullock that hath horns and hoofs.
lineList.cn: 这便叫耶和华喜悦，胜似献牛，或是献有角有蹄的公牛。

lineList.en: The humble shall see this, and be glad: and your heart shall live that seek God.
lineList.cn: 谦卑的人看见了，就喜乐。寻求神的人，愿你们的心苏醒。

lineList.en: For the LORD heareth the poor, and despiseth not his prisoners.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华听了穷乏人，不藐视被囚的人。

lineList.en: Let the heaven and earth praise him, the seas, and every thing that moveth therein.
lineList.cn: 愿天和地，洋海，和其中一切的动物，都赞美他。

lineList.en: For God will save Zion, and will build the cities of Judah: that they may dwell there, and have it in possession.
lineList.cn: 因为神要拯救锡安，建造犹大的城邑。他的民要在那里居住，得以为业。

lineList.en: The seed also of his servants shall inherit it: and they that love his name shall dwell therein.
lineList.cn: 他仆人的后裔，要承受为业。爱他名的人，也要住在其中。
